recipe_name: Stir-fried broccoli with chilli and garlic
author: Garrey Dawson
method: Heat the olive oil in a wok over a high heat. Add the garlic, broccoli and chilli flakes and stir fry for 5-6 minutes.  Add the soy sauce, and season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper.  To serve, place the stir-fried broccoli onto a serving plate with a dipping dish of soy sauce on the side if desired.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  ½ head broccoli, cut into florets,  ½ tsp chilli flakes,  2 tbsp soy sauce,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  soy sauce, to serve (optional)
